heading: TARGETED MUSCLES: Shoulders. WHAT YOU NEED: Hand-held weights. TIP: As you progress, use a heavier weight and alternate arms until you can lift the weight comfortably with both arms. This exercise will strengthen your shoulders and make lifting groceries easier.

steps.1: You can do this exercise while standing or sitting in a sturdy, armless chair.
steps.2: Keep your feet flat on the floor, shoulder-width apart.
steps.3: Hold hand weights straight down at your sides with palms facing inward. Breathe in slowly.
steps.4: Slowly breathe out as you raise both arms to the side, shoulder height.
steps.6: Breathe in as you slowly lower your arms.
